unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Hope he's fit for the Asia Cup! Remember how Chahal got sidelined before the last T20 series in Guwahati? Btw, heard Rishabh Pant is recovering well at Kokilaben Hospital, Mumbai. "Chak De! India" kind of comeback expected! Hope he's back hitting those sixes soon, just like MSD! Fingers crossed for everyone's speedy recovery. Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah's injury? Hope he is fit for the Asia Cup! Remember how Chahal got sidelined before the last T-two-zero series in Guwahati? By the way, heard Rishabh Pant is recovering well at Kokilaben Hospital, Mumbai. "Chak De! India" kind of comeback expected! Hope he is back hitting those sixes soon, just like M S D! Fingers crossed for everyone's speedy recovery. Jai Hind!
